sentences.en: A man once asked, " What is the secret of the indestructible Jew? "
sentences.cn: 曾经有位先生问过: “ 犹太人不灭的秘密是什么? ”

sentences.en: As such, it is precious as the sign of an indestructible instinct.
sentences.cn: 严格说来作为一种无法磨灭的本性的标志, 它是如此可贵.

sentences.en: Combined daring and caution increased his confidence and convinced him that they were both indestructible.
sentences.cn: 小心与大胆放在一处,他便越来越能自信,他深信自己与车都是铁作的.

sentences.en: David Ricardo described land as the " original and indestructible power of the soil. "
sentences.cn: 大卫?李嘉图把土地描述为 “ 土壤固有的不可毁灭的力量 ”.

sentences.en: Furniture for young children needs to be indestructible.
sentences.cn: 幼儿用的家具须不易损坏.
黄金几乎是不可毁坏的。
她根深蒂固的乐观主义

sentences.en: It expresses the notion that matter is indestructible.
sentences.cn: 它反映了一种想法即物质是不可消灭的.

sentences.en: Lord Krsna said: the supreme indestructible reality is declared the Ultimate Truth.
sentences.cn: 主奎师那说: 至高的不可毁灭的实相就被称作根本真理.

sentences.en: Molded plastic is almost indestructible, but scuffs easily.
sentences.cn: 注塑几乎弄不坏，但是容易磨损。

sentences.en: plastic containers that are virtually indestructible
sentences.cn: 几乎不可毁坏的塑料容器

sentences.en: Roger's hands off him now the fear drained and the indestructible meanness welled up.
sentences.cn: 罗杰的拳头刚刚离身,怕得要死的心情刚一松动,他那百摧不垮的无赖脾性又上来了.

sentences.en: The human spirit is virtually indestructible.
sentences.cn: 人的精神实际上是不可摧毁的。

sentences.en: These tiles must be virtually indestructible against high - speed friction.
sentences.cn: 这些瓷片必须是无法摧毁的,才能抵挡 高速 的摩擦.

sentences.en: They are imperishable and indestructible and thus eternal.
sentences.cn: 它们亘古不变,不可摧毁,所以是永存不朽的.
人们都说你是杀不死的,库特曼.

sentences.en: This type of plastic is almost indestructible.
sentences.cn: 这种塑料几乎牢不可破。

words.tran_cn: 不灭性；不能破坏；不可毁性

trans.tran_cn: 不能破坏的，不可毁灭的，坚不可摧
